item.title: Color and Transparency
item.description: Working with Color in p5.js There are a number of ways to set the color of objects, shapes, backgrounds, and outlines in p5.js. With the exception of stroke outlines (which uses the stroke() function) and canvas backgrounds (which uses the background() function), we will use the fill() function to add color to things that we draw. The fill()function works like a paint can resting on top of a ladder: when it tips over, it will change the color of everything below it.
